name: Senior Build and Release Engineer
description:
GE (NYSE: GE) is the world's Digital Industrial Company, transforming industry with software-defined machines and solutions that are connected, responsive and predictive. GE is organized around a global exchange of knowledge, the "GE Store," through which each business shares and accesses the same technology, markets, structure and intellect. Each invention further fuels innovation and application across our industrial sectors. With people, services, technology and scale, GE delivers better outcomes for customers by speaking the language of industry

GE Digital is the team behind Predix, the world's first cloud-based industrial operating system, empowering millions of businesses to run smarter and improve people's lives. We build the software that transforms the way people connect with their data, devices and machines

Role Summary/Purpose

As a Sr Build and Release Engineer, you will build and support one of the important and huge GE’s Predix Private Cloud component - Insights. You will be aware how private cloud platform works and how integrate components each other.

You will help build the cloud services infrastructure, container and storage fabric, and platform as a service. You will also be responsible for deployment, monitoring, and capacity management of systems at web scale in a fully virtualized IaaS and PaaS operating environment. Working closely with GE Digital technical product managers, you will deliver the platform that runs the Industrial Internet.

In this role, you will:

  • Design and develop applications for data services: Airflow/Spark/Hadoop/Ambari/Redis
  • Transform already written applications and adopt them to the new software
  • Work in Private Cloud infrastructure with Kubernetes/CloudFoundry
  • Write Dockerfiles, build container images
  • Write Ansible playbooks for configuration management and deployment automation
  • Eliminate vulnerabilities
  • Maintain technical documentation
  • Communicate with teammates from different countries

Technical Stack: Linux, VMWare, Kubernetes/CloudFoundry, Jenkins, Ansible, Airflow, Hadoop, PostgreSQL, Redis, Cassandra, Kafka, Artifactory, Bash.

Qualifications/Requirements

  • 3 or more years of experience in IT
  • Degree/Diploma or higher in Computer Science
  • Fluent in English with good writing skills
  • Analytical thinking, problem-solving, and results-oriented skills

Desired Characteristics

  • Deep understanding of Linux, cloud technologies (Cloud Foundry or Kubernetes), data center management and virtualization (VMWare)
  • Deep understanding tools and projects: CI/CD (Gitlab CI, Jenkins), configuration management (Ansible, Bash, Puppet)
  • Significant knowledge of of Microservices development process
  • Experience with high-load applications
  • Experience in one or more of the following: Java, NodeJS, Python, Go, Groovy and shell scripting bash
